properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 6:57PM CST until January 21 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen
* until Tuesday January 21.
* At 06 PM Friday the stage was 14.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring AND Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 15.1 feet on Saturday January 18.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Sunday January 12 and will
continue rising to near 15.1 feet by Saturday January 18. The river
will fall below flood stage Tuesday January 21.
* At 15.0 feet...Water is covering a portion of Airbase Road located
on the west bank of the river. Low-lying farm land is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Saturday morning or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
